title: Date with an Angel
overview: Aspiring composer Jim Sanders is engaged to spoiled rich girl Patty. But the morning after his bachelor party, Jim wakes up to discover a beautiful, broken-winged angel in his pool. When everyone finds out about his heavenly houseguest, Jim must cope with a dangerously jealous fianc√©e, an exploitive future father-in-law and a group of buddies with an outrageous business plan!
